'''The Island''' is the titular setting of [[Minecraft: The Island|''Minecraft: The Island'']], the first ''Minecraft'' novel. A mysterious location that [[Guy]] washes up on, where he has to fight the rules of ''[[Minecraft]]'' to survive.

== Trivia ==

* The Island as it appears in both tie-in maps are actually one and the same. If one returns to the site of the opening cinematic in [[Minecraft: The Mountain (map)|The Mountain]], an inactive version of the area can even be found, with nonfunctional [[Command Block|features]].
